entry.title: Leveraging PyTorch Natural Language Processing Models in the Elastic Stack

author.name: Kim Jong-min, Park Yu-na, Hwang Han-gyeol

entry.summary:
Description

The latest version of Elastic Stack, a popular data search and analysis tool, has added features for natural language processing (NLP). This article explains the process of analyzing user reviews of Google Play Store collected through crawling via Text Classification by applying a language model trained with PyTorch to â€¦
entry.content:
Description

The latest version of Elastic Stack, a popular data search and analysis tool, has added features for natural language processing (NLP). This article explains the process of analyzing user reviews of Google Play Store collected through crawling via Text Classification by applying a language model trained with PyTorch to Elasticsearch.
